co.edu.unbosque.Hatchiko.jpa.repositories

Interface PetRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PetRepositoryImpl

    public interface PetRepository
    Interface called Pet Repository, here the search for the list of pets by id is established, in addition to finding all the information stored in it, the method of saving pets and updating pets by id is initialized, which contains two variables such as Integer and String (id, name, species, race, size, gender and image)
